name: Neoblast
description:
Neoblast is a bullet hell arcade shooter inspired by classics like Space Invaders and Galaga. As the last defender of Earth, shoot your way through the Alien Armada and defeat the  Hive Mind to stop the invaders for good!

Controls

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to Move
  • Left Click to Shoot
  • Shift to Boost
  • Esc to Pause
